attributes.action: TELL US if 'pressing' the Nigerian president involves more and much bigger buckets of our taxpayer pounds being handed over.
attributes.additional_details:
What we want you to do is in upper case lettering.  You seem, so often, to be unable to identify what it is we want you to do for us.  We hope this is helpful.

The one thing worse than using our money as your own without oversight of any sort is handing that money over to known corrupt governments who you know will use it to kill innocents.  It is the ONE thing you do well Mr Slippery and it shames all of us.
